Type.Name: ModuleHook

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ModuleHook(Gnome.Program program, Gnome.ModuleInfo mod_info);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Called to perform some initialization in a module (which could be either the main init function or the pre or post argument parsing phase).
Docs.param: The instance which is being initialized.
